headline: Analyst Sentiment on Vistra (VST) Remains Strong Following Goldman Sachs’ Bullish Update
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the best performing S&P 500 stocks in the last five years. More than 90% of analysts are bullish on Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) as of February 6, 2026, with a consensus price target of $232, implying 62.2% upside. Citing the recent decline in shares and rising estimates, Goldman Sachs upgraded […]

headline: Assessing Vistra (VST) Valuation After Choppy Returns And A Rich Earnings Multiple
summary: Why Vistra Is On Investors’ Radar Today Vistra (VST) has drawn fresh attention after recent share moves and mixed return figures over the past year, prompting investors to reassess how its current valuation lines up with its fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Vistra. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 4.33% 1 day share price return and 4.31% 7 day share price return contrasting with a 30 day share price return of 4.07% decline and 90 day share price return of 10.47% decline. At the...

headline: NiSource (NI) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: NiSource (NI) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.08% and +45.49%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Vistra (VST) After Its Surging Multi Year Run?
summary: This article examines whether Vistra's current share price still offers value or whether most of the opportunity may already be reflected, focusing on what the present valuation implies for you as a shareholder or potential investor. Vistra closed at US$159.60, with returns of 4.3% over the last 7 days, a 4.1% decline over 30 days, a 3.4% decline year to date, and a 4.3% decline over 1 year. Over 3 years and 5 years, the returns are described as very large at around 6x and 7x...
